mapper.insert: insert into sys_resource (resource_id, resource_name, parent_id, resource_url, status, create_time, update_time, remark) values (#{resourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resourceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sys_resource set resource_name = #{resourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, resource_url = #{resourceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where resource_id = #{resourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select resource_id, resource_name, parent_id, resource_url, status, create_time, update_time, remark from sys_resource where resource_id = #{resourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select resource_id, resource_name, parent_id, resource_url, status, create_time, update_time, remark from sys_resource
